H0.text: where did the latin language originate from. Ancient Greece

H1.text: where did the latin language originate from. Etruscan Civilization

H2.text: where did the latin language originate from. Indo-European Migrations

H3.text: where did the latin language originate from. Italic languages

A4.text: It is generally believed that those 1st millennium Italic languages descend from Indo-European languages brought by migrants to the peninsula sometime in the 2nd millennium BC through Bell Beaker and Urnfield culture groups north and east of the Alps.

A5.text: the Italic languages form a branch of the Indo-European language family, whose earliest known members were spoken on the Italian Peninsula in the first millennium BC
